author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Fix minor bug in TerraTextInputSkin; fix bug in determining click count in Container.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Eliminate thread-local ApplicationContext instance; this was meant to allow multiple applets to use a static method to obtain a reference to the applet-specific application context, but it doesn't work because multiple applets may run in the same UI thread.
This change also necessitated the elimination of instance-specific methods such as open(URL, String) and eval().

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Add support for custom local clipboard and DnD data.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Move MonitoredInputStream and MonitoredOutputStream to pivot.io.IOTask; refactor pivot.web.Query and pivot.wtk.media.Image.LoadTask to extend IOTask.

author: gkbrown@mac.com
msg: Eliminate compiler warnings; fix minor bug in TerraCalendarSkin.
